DOC.brief_summary: This is a trial of Ateronon in Patients with Coronary Disease to Evaluate its Effectiveness in Assessing the Risk Factors of Atherosclerosis.
DOC.brief_title: Trial of Ateronon in Patients With Coronary Disease to Evaluate Its Effectiveness in Assessing the Risk Factors of Atherosclerosis
DOC.criteria: Men and Women with demonstrated Coronary Disease AtheroAbzyme positive during screening process Elevated Total Cholesterol Willingness to take study nutritional supplement once a day for 3 months Women who are pregnant, nursing or intend pregnancy during the period of treatment Known milk, soy or whey allergy
